Key Capabilities of AssetX

Asset Lifecycle Management

Track assets from acquisition to disposal for optimal utilization and compliance.

Budget & Project Management

Oversee financial allocations and project progress related to asset deployment.

Finance Management

Integrate asset values with financial reports and depreciation schedules.

Workflow & Approvals

Automate and streamline asset-related requests and approvals.

Procurement

Manage purchasing across vendors from selection to delivery.

Inventory Management

Maintain accurate records of all assets across sites and storage.

Asset Movement

Monitor physical relocation of assets between sites or departments.

Maintenance

Schedule, track, and manage preventive and reactive maintenance.

Disposal

Handle secure end-of-life processes including decommissioning and sale.

Asset Verification

Conduct audits to confirm asset existence and condition.

See AssetX in Action: A Comprehensive Overview

Discover how AssetX revolutionizes asset management, from acquisition to disposal, with intuitive features, real‑time tracking, and powerful analytics to minimize downtime.

Technology Advantages

Cloud Deployment

Leverage flexible, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure with zero maintenance.

Mobile App with Offline Capabilities

Scan and update assets on the go. Fully functional in low-connectivity environments.

Robust Integration Options

Connect ERP, CRM, and data warehouses using flexible APIs and webhooks.

Advanced Security Features

Encryption, SSO, multi-factor authentication, and comprehensive audit logs.

AI‑Powered Predictive Maintenance

Predict failures, reduce downtime, and extend asset life with machine learning.

GPS and RFID Tracking

Real‑time location visibility and geofencing with integrated GPS/RFID.
